==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy          = Noailles

|name_1         = Swing
|desc_1         = Swings his polearm once, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This is sometimes followed up by the second hit of '''Double Stab'''.

|name_2         = Stab
|desc_2         = Stabs once, dealing '''70% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3         = Double Stab
|desc_3         = Stabs twice, dealing '''80% ATK''', '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_4         = Flurry
|desc_4         = As a follow-up to '''Swing''' or '''Stab''' if close, swings his polearm three times, dealing '''70% ATK''', '''60% ATK''', '''60% ATK''', '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_5         = Charge
|desc_5         = As a follow-up to '''Swing''' or '''Stab''' if far, charges forward, dealing '''15% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} to targets in its path, then performs a leaping downward cleave, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
}}
